signals.name: brush_scale_trigger
signals.update: (!isArray(brush_Country) || (invert("concat_0_y", brush_y)[0] === brush_Country[0] && invert("concat_0_y", brush_y)[1] === brush_Country[1])) ? brush_scale_trigger : {}

on.update: brush_Country ? {unit: "concat_0", intervals: [{encoding: "y", field: "Country", extent: brush_Country}]} : null

signals.name: brush_scale_trigger
signals.update: (!isArray(brush_Country) || (invert("concat_1_y", brush_y)[0] === brush_Country[0] && invert("concat_1_y", brush_y)[1] === brush_Country[1])) ? brush_scale_trigger : {}

on.update: brush_Country ? {unit: "concat_1", intervals: [{encoding: "y", field: "Country", extent: brush_Country}]} : null

brush_Population_ages_65_and_above_of_total && brush_Population_ages_15_64_of_total ? {unit: "concat_2", intervals: [{encoding: "x", field: "Population_ages_65_and_above_of_total", extent: brush_Population_ages_65_and_above_of_total}, {encoding: "y", field: "Population_ages_15_64_of_total", extent: brush_Population_ages_15_64_of_total}]} : null
{x: x(unit), y: y(unit), extent_x: slice(brush_x), extent_y: slice(brush_y)}
